page.title: 18FARMING CONT.
page.content: FARMS AT SLAPE CROSS AND EAST BOWER BACK ONTO THE M5 MOTORWAY.THIS DOES NOT SEEM TO CAUSE ANY INCOVENIENCE. SOME IN EAST BOWER TAKE IN GUESTS FOR BED AND BREAKFAST.BOWER GREEN FARM IS A DAIRY FARM.80 GALLONS OF MILK ARE SENT DAILY TO WELLINGTON.ALL THE CALVES ARE SENT TO MARKET.THEY HAVE 44 COWS,14 PIGLETS,1 PIG,2 SOWS,15 HENS 5 CALVES,20 YOUNG CATTLE,1 HORSE, 2 DOGS, 1 SHEEP,11 DUCKS,1 BULL,2 TRACTORS,1 DUNG SPREADER,1 MOWER,1 HAYBOB,2 TRAILERS,1 ROLLER,1 HORSEBOX, AND 1 SPRAYER.THEY USE STRAW FOR ANIMAL BEDDING.THEY MAKE HAY AND SILAGE.THEYUSE NITROGEN FERTILISERS.THEY OWN 65 ACRES OF LAND.THE HOUSE IS OVER 300 YEARS OLD. THE FARMER AND HIS WIFE WORK THE FARM BY THEMSELVES WITHOUT OUTSIDE HELP. SOME FARMERS USE CONTRACTORS TO HELP WITH THE WORK AT BUSY TIMES.
